reg_pit.title: B.C. Mushroom Marketing Board Powers and Duties Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 533/2004, effective January 1, 2005.

reg.title: B.C. Mushroom Marketing Board Powers and Duties Regulation

section.sectiontext: The performance and exercise, by the British Columbia Mushroom Marketing Board, of functions, duties and powers under the British Columbia Mushroom Order (S.O.R./78-444), made under the Agricultural Products Marketing Act (Canada), is approved.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Natural Products Marketing (BC) Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 330, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 5 and 22]
